definition: original meaning/literal sense
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
justice/righteousness/meaning/foster (father etc)/adopted/artificial (tooth, limb etc)/relationship/friendship
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: It is the essence of what I mean when I talk about eating to flourish.
sentences.chinese: 这正是当我谈论食疗健身时的想说的本义。

sentences.english: The saying means no matter how skillful a housewife is, she can't cook a meal without rice literally.
sentences.chinese: 本义为再巧的主妇，要是没有米也做不出饭来。

sentences.english: According to the relation of sememes, a word has both original meaning and extended meaning.
sentences.chinese: 从词义义位之间的关系看，词有本义和引申义。

sentences.english: The paper introduces a high-power detecting - device based on magnetostrictive effect for the NDT of steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 本义介绍了大功率磁致伸缩检测仪的研制。

sentences.english: name If we named it based on what it is, it's a name.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们基于本义来命名，它就是一个。

sentences.english: There are different interpretations for the original meaning of" Yue".
sentences.chinese: 对“龠”本义的解释，古说颇多，分歧很大。

sentences.english: Yoshiaki Miyamoto hooked just one eel on his morning stint on Lake Biwa, near Kyoto.
sentences.chinese: 京都附近琵琶湖，宫本义明早上出海钓到一条鳗鱼。

sentences.english: Its original meaning is that the fox borrows the tiger's ferocity to bluster other wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 本义是狐狸借着老虎的威势去吓唬别的野兽。

sentences.english: 'Dou', denoting food containers in ancient times, means the same thing as 'shu' did in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 豆的本义为古食内器，其今义在古代用“菽”表示。

sentences.english: The original meaning of inculcation is delivering, and it is a neutral concept.
sentences.chinese: 灌输的本义是“输送”，它是个中性的概念。

sentences.english: The sacrificial rites are not only commemoratory activities, but originally the offerings to gods.
sentences.chinese: 这种祭祀不能仅视为纪念活动，其本义就是祀神。

sentences.english: The core of success is achieving one’s wishes.
sentences.chinese: 而成功的本义就是指达到自己的愿望。

sentences.english: The notion of analogy came from music language in the West Zhou Dynasty, referring to comparison by species.
sentences.chinese: 兴的概念来自西周的乐语，其本义是连类譬喻。

definition: original meaning
extended meaning (of an expression)/derived sense
Shuowen Jiezi, the original Han dynasty Chinese character dictionary with 10,516 entries, authored by Xu Shen 許慎|许慎[Xu3 Shen4] in 2nd century
combined ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character that combines the meanings of existing elements/also known as joint ideogram or associative compounds
see 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]
loan character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/character acquiring meanings by phonetic association/also called phonetic loan
the meaning of a phonetic loan character 假借字[jia3 jie4 zi4] acquired from a similar-sounding word (e.g. 而[er2] originally meant "beard" but acquired the meaning "and")
original form of a Chinese character
the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
ancient meaning/original or etymological meaning of a word
phonetic loan character/using one character interchangeably for phonetically related characters
meaning of a character
Xu Shen (-147) the compiler of the original Han dynasty dictionary Shuowen Jiezi 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]
pictogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character derived from a picture/sometimes called hieroglyph
semantic component of a phono-semantic character (e.g. component刂[dao1] in 刻[ke4])
ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character indicating an idea, such as up and down/also known as self-explanatory character
